chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: Semantic Tags tell the browsers and web crawlers who want to understand your website properly.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: They tell them what is the content of your website and what is the purpose of which place and which tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: If you don't use Semantic Tags in HTML, then your work will be done.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: It's not like if you don't use Semantic Tags, then your website won't look good.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: You can do good designing.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: But we want to explain to Google and Bing search engines about our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And if we explain them about our website, then they will be able to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And they will rank our website on Google, Bing, and respective search engines.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And we want the crawlers to understand our website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: And we want whoever wants to understand our website to understand it well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: That's why there are some special tags like header, nav, main, article, figure.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: All these special tags are made in HTML, which help you to structure your website.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: Now if there is something in the header, then I know that it is the header.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: That is, it is at the top.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: If there is something in the footer, then I will understand that the website has started ending from here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: This footer started here.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: This footer could also be div.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: But no, if I am using Semantic HTML, then I will use the footer tag.

chunks.text: this time I will not make my navigation bar in the span tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: I will make my navigation bar in the nav tag.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
chunks.text: So these kinds of differences explain our search engines very well.

chunks.title: Semantic Tags  in HTML
